channel.title: On a Personal Note on Ypertex Blog
channel.description: Recent content in On a Personal Note on Ypertex Blog

item.title: The Making of the Ypertex Logo
item.description: For a blog claiming to primarily write about design (according to its current tag line “Design, Technology, Future”), I have yet to do so after three articles. Let me change that today—but before I write about other people’s designs, I would like to first promote my credibility and address one of my own designs: this blog’s logo. This article explains how I generally approach new designs using the example of the Ypertex logo.

item.title: Years in the Making, Launching Today: The Ypertex Blog
item.description: Finally. After literally years of intending to start blogging (the first design sketch dates back to May 2010, and I registered the Ypertex domains in December 2010), I am proud to publish the first post on my own blog. Now what took me so long? Lots of Reasons Not to Blog Content First and foremost, up until now I felt that I did not have anything really relevant to say to a broader audience.
